verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What heart could hold the weight of Your love
And know the heights of Your great worth
What eyes could look on Your glorious face
Shining like the sun

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are holy, holy, holy
God most high and God most worthy
You are holy, holy, holy
Jesus, You are
Jesus, You are

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your name alone has power to raise us
Your light will shine when all else fades
Our eyes will look on Your glorious face
Shining like the sun
Who is like You, God?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are holy, holy, holy
God most high and God most worthy
You are holy, holy, holy
Jesus, You are
Jesus, You are

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus, You are
Jesus, You are

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Who shall we say You are
You're the living God
Who shall we say You are
You're the Great I AM
The highest name of all
You're all You say You are

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
You are holy, holy, holy
God most high and God most worthy
You are holy, holy, holy
Jesus, You are
Jesus, You are

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Jesus, You are
Jesus, You are

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
And You shall come again in glory
To judge the living and the dead
All eyes will look on Your glorious face
Shining like the sun
Who is like You, God?

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
You are holy, holy, holy
God most high and God most worthy
You are holy, holy, holy
Jesus, You are
Jesus, You are

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Jesus, You are
Jesus, You are
